kateacuff.comment: I'm still concerned about how much time has passed since we began discussing this topic.  The survey was conducted two months ago, and we've had three meetings where we discussed it.  But we haven't had an opportunity to see student responses to either question. So I'd like more input from students before adopting these changes.

jonnoalcaro.comment: Thank you, everybody. I'm going to go ahead and call this meeting to order. Good morning, everybody. This is the second meeting of the Albemarle County Public Schools School Board for 2021. Our first item of business is approval of the agenda. Do we have a motion?
